text: Thibault De Smet (born 5 June 1998) is a Belgian professional footballer who plays as defender for French Ligue 1 club Stade de Reims. == References == ==External links== *Belgium profile at Belgian FA Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Belgian footballers Category:Belgium youth international footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Belgian First Division A players Category:Ligue 1 players Category:K.A.A.
